description: To address the remote code execution potential in Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) versions, users should upgrade to Microsoft Edge version 119.0.2151.72, which was released on November 16, 2023. This update mitigates the associated risks by applying critical patches to strengthen the application's defenses against potential exploits. Users can find additional details and guidance in KB Article KB-119.0.2151.72. The affected builds of the extended stable channel include 118.0.2088.109 and 119.0.6045.159. Regular updates to Microsoft Edge are essential for maintaining security and stability in the operating environment.
